Dabrah et al.
21
,
88
,
89 found two compounds CP-225917 ( 63) and CP-263114 ( 64) from unidentified fungi, which have some characteristics of Phoma sp. The structures of the two compounds were analysed by means of extensive NMR measurements, UV spectra, and FT-IR spectra
89 . It was verified by experiments that both compounds inhibited FTase in the brain of mice (IC 50 = 6 and 20 μM).
